Package SwissCheese.engine.keyboard.keyActions

Package for key actions for the game.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    KeyAction
    Interface for Key Actions of buttons.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExitGame
    Quits Game (WITHOUT SAVING)
    GoBackward
    Go Backward Action (moves camera backward).
    GoForward
    Go Forward Action (moves camera forward).
    GoLeft
    Go Left Action (moves camera left).
    GoRight
    Go Right Action (moves camera Right).
    OpenMenu
    Opens The Menu
    PanLeft
    Pans camera left
    PanRight
    Pans camera right
    SaveGame
    Saves Game
    TestAction
    Test action used for testing the keyboard

Package SwissCheese.engine.keyboard.keyActions Description

Package for key actions for the game.

v0.2, 2018-12-1
